    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.contento.se:112501</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>
            <entry>112501</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Part 4 - Facts - Module 2</string>
            <string language="en">Part 4 - Facts - Module 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teil 4 - Tatsachen - Modul 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Partie 4 - Faits - Module 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Parte 4 - Fatos - Módulo 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parte 4 - Fatti - Modulo 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρος 4 - γεγονότα - ενότητα 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Parte 4 - Hechos - Módulo 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">In this part you get an idea of how the English language is spread over the world, and how it sounds in different places.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
            <string language="en">In this party you get an idea of how the English language is spread over the world, and how it sounds in different places. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">world</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">world</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Partei erhalten Sie eine Idee, 
von wie der englischen Sprache die Welt ausgestreut wird und von wie 
sie in den unterschiedlichen Plätzen klingt. Safir - Englisch 
und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 2 - wieviel ist es?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En cette partie vous avez une idée de la façon 
dont l'anglais est réparti le monde, et de la façon dont il retentit
dans différents endroits. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour 
des débutants - module 2 - combien coûte-t-il ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste partido você começa uma idéia de como a 
língua inglesa é espalhada sobre o mundo, e de como soa em lugares 
diferentes. Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para 
novatos - módulo 2 - quanto é ele?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questo partito ottenete un'idea di come la 
lingua inglese è estesa per il mondo e di come suona nei posti 
differenti. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - 
modulo 2 - quanto è esso?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το συμβαλλόμενο μέρος παίρνετε μια ιδέα για 
το πώς η αγγλική γλώσσα είναι εξαπλωμένη στον κόσμο, και το πώς
ηχεί στις διαφορετικές θέσεις. Safir - αγγλική και 
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 2 - πόσο 
είναι αυτή;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este partido usted consigue una idea de cómo 
el lenguaje inglés se extiende por el mundo, y de cómo suena en 
diversos lugares. ¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los 
principiantes - módulo 2 - cuánto es él?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saphir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
